entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Visual Cue FLAC DMX MP3 Player
entry.id: Visual Cue FLAC DMX MP3 Player-us-1750022137927
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Manage your audio libraryï¼š$79.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $79.99]

Application Description

Visual Cue Pro is an advanced, easy-to-use audio player for iOS and iPadOS. Main Features: â€¢ Waveform view for visual seeking and setting up cue points â€¢ Zoom functionality for more precise seeking on longer waveforms â€¢ Caches waveforms for fast display â€¢ Supports unlimited cue points per file â€¢ Quickly switch between cue points across multiple audio files â€¢ Does not alter your precious source files in any way â€¢ Drag & drop files directly from Files and other apps â€¢ Designed for speed and efficiency â€¢ GPU-based waveform renderer â€¢ Supports Dark Mode Collections: â€¢ Import files from Files using drag & drop â€¢ Manage your music library â€¢ Create cue points within each item Playlists: â€¢ Import files from Collections using drag & drop (cue points included) â€¢ Import files from Files using drag & drop (without cue points) â€¢ Create cue points within each item (shared across playlists if the item is from a Collection) â€¢ Reorder items using drag & drop in your desired order For Music Producers: â€¢ Manage your library of reference tracks to compare with your own â€¢ Quickly jump between cue points in your reference tracks â€¢ Manage and listen to your own tracks â€¢ Organize production elements and recorded source material For DJs: â€¢ Manage your library of tracks â€¢ Set up cue points in your tracks â€¢ Compile DJ sets by quickly jumping between cue points in different tracks â€¢ Manage and listen to your own mixes â€¢ Bookmark tracks in other DJsâ€™ sets and discover new music faster Visual Cue Pro is an offline music player, music library manager, and music organizer with lossless playback, widely used in sound studios, by music directors, A&R, and for audio transcribing. It's also perfect for venues, theaters, churches, DJs, and more! It features full-screen support, native Apple Silicon support, Dark Mode, and cloud drive compatibility. The best reliable alternative to iTunes, plays audio files and formats supported by macOS, including WAV, AIFF, FLAC, MP3, M4A, and more. Free to download and try. Purchase modules via in-app purchase (subscriptions or lifetime permanent license). If you have a Mac, check out the macOS version too, which offers even more functionality! Privacy Policy: http://visualcueplayer.com/privacy.html Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Audio Editor & Music Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Permanent membershipï¼š$11.99 â†’ $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]

Application Description

Want to make your own unique phone ringtones? Or want to combine multiple songs and synthesize the music you want? Or want to know the effect of mixing different songs? Audio Editor & Music Mixer is an easy to operate music cutting and mixing tool. Simple and excellent, functional and practical! Whether you are a professional musician or music amateur, you can play easily. Features: 1.Professional ringtone clip: free to edit, the maximum clipping of the ringtone is 40s (in line with the characteristics of ringtones) 2.Simple music stitching: song editing and splicing as a whole,connect the favorite songs 3.Unique music mixing: free to cut the two songs, mixed together to play, feel different music effects! Subscription instrutionsï¼š - After you subscribe to the VIP, you have unlimited access to all features - Subscribe to provide 4 types of VIP services, including: weekly VIP service, monthly VIP service, yearly VIP service, permanent VIP service - Subscribe to $2.49 per week, $4.49 per month, $13.49 for 1 year and $14.99 for permanent - The purchase process is to deduct the purchase amount from the iTunes account - Account will be charged at the cost of the selected package within 24 hours prior to the current period - Cancellation of current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.But you can cancel next subscription. - You can access our privacy policy by visiting (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_en.html - You can access (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_en.html to read the Terms of Service *The price is equivalent to the 'Apple App Store Matrix' which is equivalent to the subscription price in US dollars.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Vythm VJ - Music Visualizer DJ
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All features and modesï¼š$44.99 â†’ $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $44.99]

Application Description

--- Experience Your Music with Vythm --- Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely. --- Your Vision, Your Visualization --- Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision: - Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds. - MIDI input for precise visual control. - NDI streaming support for sharing your creations. - Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more. - Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments. And much more! The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription. --- Input Formats --- Select your music from a variety of sources: - Import any mp3 or m4a files. - Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported). - Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases. - Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration. --- Record Your Masterpiece --- Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece. --- Share Your Thoughts --- Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org. If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm! Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Meitu-AI Photo Editor & Design
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly Auto-renew Meitu SVIPï¼š$84.99 â†’ $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $84.99]

Application Description

Meitu is the simplest image processing tool that can quickly achieve professional-level photo editing effects. AI tools are constantly updated, and everyone can make good pictures! === AI image modification, intelligent design without effort === [AI Cutout] Efficient in all categories, 3s background removal, one-click change of background color/local pictures [AI Remover] One-click removal of redundant text, passers-by, skin acne spots, complex backgrounds, etc., without leaving any traces! [AI Enhancer] Ultra-clear image quality rebirth, say goodbye to poor image quality [AI Background Change] Enter keywords, AI generates product and portrait scene pictures [AI Expand] Freely expand the picture frame, intelligently fill the picture, and the composition does not need to be cropped! [AI Smart Selection] Any element can be freely moved, scaled, copied, redrawn, eliminated, and adjusted in color... ===Meitu Batch Editor, efficient and higher quality=== Import hundreds of pictures at a time, batch cut out pictures to change backgrounds, make them clear, add watermarks, crop and change sizes, compress and convert formats, etc., without repeated operations, efficient and refined! ===Poster design, change pictures and words with one click=== Massive high-quality templates cover e-commerce, administrative office, new media, WeChat and many other scenarios. ===Puzzle splicing, creative layout=== Seamless, horizontal and vertical, four-grid, nine-grid, love, triangle and many other puzzle styles, you can also freely assemble, social more colorful! ===Basic picture editing, simple and outstanding=== [Add text] [Crop, rotate, correct, and adjust size] [Dimming, color adjustment, and filter][Border stickers] [Brush] ===Medical-grade portrait beauty, high-definition natural face=== [One-click beauty and whitening] [Facial reshaping] [Face slimming, body slimming, height increase] [Eye and Teeth Refinement] â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” [Meitu computer version SVIP automatic renewal service statement] [Meitu computer SVIP rights] Experience massive materials, personalized functions, and more refreshing without ads. [Subscription period] Meitu Computer SVIP - Continuous Monthly Subscription: Subscription period of 1 month Meitu PC SVIP - Continuous Season: Subscription period of 3 months Meitu PC SVIP - Consecutive Yearly Subscription: Subscription period of 12 months [Subscription price] The iAP application information shall prevail. For example, continuous monthly subscription products are 20 yuan per month; continuous seasonal subscription products are 50 yuan per quarter; continuous annual subscription products are 168 yuan per year. [Payment] After the user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be charged to the iTunes account. [Renewal] "Continuous monthly/quarterly/yearly" products are auto-renewable products, and your iTunes account will be charged after confirming the purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription. Within 24 hours before your subscription period expires, Apple will automatically deduct the fee from your iTunes account, and the membership validity period will be automatically extended by one period after success. [Cancel renewal] If you want to cancel the automatic renewal, please manually go to "Settings" on your iPhone - click "Apple ID", select to enter the "Subscription" page, and select "Meitu SVIP" to cancel the subscription. [Free Trial] Renew the subscription during the free trial period to cancel the renewal, and the free trial rights will not be recovered from the user, and the user can try it until the trial period ends. ==Related Agreement== Membership Service Agreement: https://pc.meitu.com/agreement Privacy Policy Address: https://pc.meitu.com/legal-agreement?type=pc

Application Screenshot

iPhone
